action_item: Topics - Discuss the billing process in Dr. Cloud EHR and creating claims.
notes: Focus on generating claims, marking claims as billed, and handling special scenarios.

action_item: Requirements - Update the rate tables and master charge list in Dr. Cloud EHR.
notes: Ensure usual and customary rates are accurate and up to date.

action_item: Service Codes - Implement billing rules related to age of the client and diagnoses.
notes: Set up rules that apply specific service codes based on client age and diagnosis.

action_item: Reports - Generate month-end closed report for the general ledger.
notes: Include details on outstanding balances and collections.

action_item: Payers - Manage contract rates for payers in Dr. Cloud EHR.
notes: Edit payer contracts and ensure correct rates are applied.

action_item: Data Migration - Ensure all claims can be generated and submitted electronically.
notes: Support multiple clearinghouses and ensure data integrity.

action_item: Users & Roles - Display authorization information during appointment creation.
notes: Check authorized units to prevent exceeding limits.

action_item: Key Question - Clarify requirements for sending encounters to Medicaid authority.
notes: Determine formatting and data needed for reporting.

action_item: Reaction - Address golden threat alerts preventing claims from being billed.
notes: Implement a process for overriding alerts and capturing notes.

action_item: Workflow - Establish a process for placing clients with collection agencies.
notes: Utilize the collections aging report to manage outstanding balances.

action_item: Reports - Generate net revenue report based on contracted rates.
notes: Include expected revenue and adjustments for accurate financial tracking.
